name: Eye Eye Eye
description:
EYE EYE EYE is a platformer where you play as an animated eyeball who is trying to get to the safety of his family while facing the hazards of an unknown land.

Our hero will leap from walls, roll over the platforms (blindsighted), face deadly onion-like enemies and avoid razor sharp spikes.

This game was made for the “DEFINITELY NOT MEETING JAM” (24/05/2020) using Unity.
